phrases: Join forces?
Do not worry, everyone.
Everything's fine.
We will hear you out.
That is right.
We should cooperate together so we can achieve our goals.
You all want to escape.
I want to become Mom of this House.
I want to drag Isabella down from her position as Mom,
and seize that position for myself.
Mom's position?
Just to clarify, those are my true intentions.
I also want to break free from this situation.
Do you know about the management system here?
Girls who fulfill certain conditions and live until 12 years old
are presented with two paths when they are about to be shipped.
To continue and die, or aim to become a Mom.
What are the conditions?
Scores above a certain number and the Mom's recommendation.
If you can meet these two requirements, you can survive without escaping.
- If you are a girl.
- A girl...
But I do not recommend it.
Your body will never be able to leave this area.
What is that?
There is a chip inside.
If an adult steps one foot outside of the farm,
an electrical current will be sent through this and their heart will stop.
At the same time, if something else makes their heart stop,
then it acts as a transmitter that notifies the higher-ups.
So we could not kill the adults after all.
I can only live inside the farms.
That is why I want to live the best possible life here.
As a Mom.
Even if it is fake, it is a life for humans.
But to get that, Isabella is in the way.
If you all escape, she will be blamed.
I will not get in your way.
Escape.
That will become a benefit for me.
You are not going to ship us out?
I will not.
Let us cooperate!
Let us work together.
Wait.
Let me verify one thing with Sister.
What is it?
What is your guarantee that you will not betray us?
You will not trust me?
Just answer!
It is Ray.
If Ray tells this to Mom, you can crush me.
But if I tell Mom that Ray's been a double agent, I can crush him.
That is why neither of us will betray the other.
We cannot.
That is fine, right?
Okay.
Then we have a deal.
I will also share any other information that only I know about.
It is proof of my friendship.
Why do not you come to my room tonight?
She wants to live the best possible life, huh?
She was even one of us, too.
She does not care at all about the lives of us children!
But she said she will not ship us out.
It is not that she will not.
She cannot.
If she really wanted us to escape, she just needs to assist us quietly when the time is right.
She is showing us her cards only because she wants to gain our trust.
Why does she want our trust?
She wants evidence that shows our rebellion.
In other words, she is in a position where the higher-ups
will not trust her without reliable evidence.
Unlike Mom, she does not have the authority to ship us out.
Evidence...
Hey, what if she finds the rope we hid in the tree?
It is fine.
We can say various excuses to explain the rope.
Like we were going to use it to play with.
But
We are doomed if she finds the equipment that breaks the tracking devices.
That is reliable evidence that we cannot make excuses for.
Do not worry.
I will not make that kind of mistake.
Besides, it is not finished yet.
If we have her believe that we do not know where the tracking devices are, or how to break it,
there should not be an issue.
I am sure Sister would believe us if we play the cards correctly.
Are you really going to go?
You are dealing with that Sister Krone!
It sounds nice that she will tell us anything we want to know, but...
Rather, why do we have to join forces with her?
Does it give us an advantage?
If we use her well, we might obtain some information.
And that is one less person getting in our way.
Then we can focus on investigation.
It will be okay.
We have to use every opportunity we can.
Ray, can I talk to you?
I want to discuss the steps for the investigation.
Sure.
I have a favor to ask you two.
What do you want to know?
Go ahead.
Ask me anything.
Really, anything?
Yes.
Whether it be about the farm or about the headquarters...
Then...
Show us that thing.
The tool that receives the signal from our tracking devices.
Sure.
Here.
See?
Does not it look simple?
It only shows the current location but cannot specify who it is.
So you knew about the tracking devices?
Yes.
Mom showed us once.
But I do not know where it is or how to break it.
Sister, do you know?
Yes.
They are located in your ear.
The left ear.
Around here.
I do not know how to break them.
But if it breaks, it sends out a signal.
To that thing, and also to headquarters.
You would have to take it out.
Or cut it off.
But there are no decent blades in the House.
There is a scalpel.
For medical use.
Once we are outside, there is no medicine.
When we escape, I do not want to take risks with blood loss or infections.
The infirmary is equipped with medicine and tools.
Anesthesia, too.
Well, I think there is enough for five kids.
I will also teach you how to use them, and I will lend you the key to get to it.
That is settled.
Okay, what else?
Sister, how old are you right now?
Were you livestock ever since you were born?
How rude to ask a grown woman her age...
Is what I would like to say.
I am 26.
Born and raised at Grace Field.
Just not here at Plant Three.
Plant Three?
By the way, Isabella is 31.
That is what I saw in the records.
And the outside?
You have seen it, right?
I have not.
Oh, did you think I would say yes, even if it was a lie?
I have not.
But there are humans outside.
Your food is made by the higher-ups and us adults.
But there are humans from the outside who bring your clothes and other supplies.
I saw them at the headquarters once.
Those humans have equal standing with them.
There are humans outside who have not been eaten.
You need to get mixed in with them.
Then you do not know how long the demons have been around?
Demons?
Oh, you are talking about them.
Or do you know how the world came to be this way?
I do not know that.
Where is this House located?
I do not know.
What about the security of this area?
I know about that.
There is not much of it.
They rely on the tracking devices, so they do not have many guards posted.
I am sure they do not even patrol.
Thank you.
You are done?
Yes.
Good night.
So you already knew the location of the tracking devices and how to break them?
I am impressed.
I see.
I understand a lot now.
It is not just words that provide information.
Humans give away a lot of information just by standing there.
Attitude.
Gaze.
Blinking.
Sweat.
Gestures.
Pupils.
Pulse.
All of these are hints to find out what you are really thinking.
And yet for you two, even though I said the tracking device was in your ear,
you did not touch them to check.
The arrangements to get them out were made, but you did not look happy at all.
So, why did you ask about the tracking devices when it was not necessary?
Is there something you want to hide from me?
Are you keeping a secret?
That is fine.
Do you know about Him?
You do not know, right?
Do you want to know?
I will tell you the next time you come here.
Come back anytime.
Let us talk much more than we did today.
Mom.
I see.
There is really nothing shown at first.
So your last reward is a camera, huh?
I was interested in the phenomenon of photographs.
I have only seen photographs and cameras in books.
If I were to get greedy, I would have wanted to develop them myself.
Amazing.
It really looks like you cut out a moment in time.
Regarding that matter, is it okay if it is after lunch?
Yes, that is fine.
Well, then.
I think it is about time.
Let us go over the plan.
When we start free time after lunch, I will distract Mom.
Norman and Emma will climb the wall to inspect the vicinity.
Don and Gilda, stay outside where you can see the south window on the house's second floor.
Just in case I fail to distract Mom, I will signal you.
Let Emma and Norman know to cancel the inspection immediately.
We have six days until the escape, but at least until January, we have two and a half months
until it is time for me to be shipped out.
So if something happens, immediately cancel the inspection.
Everything needs to be done secretly.
We need to pretend to be controllable.
Don!
Play with us!
Gilda, you too!
All right!
Ready for some tag?
Ray, can we talk?
Sister found out that we can break the tracking devices?
So I want to move up the escape day.
When can you break the tracking devices?
What was that?
With this, I have all the necessary parts.
I can break them anytime now.
You weirdos.
Shut up!
This is really a double-edged sword.
Will we break the tracking devices and escape first?
Or will Sister find this evidence first and turn us in before that?
Do not worry.
I have taken care of it.
Say, I wonder why they pretended not to know?
They knew the location and how to break the tracking devices.
How did they find out in the first place?
Rather, how will they break it?
Will they use a special tool?
Could they have made such a thing?
Then would that happen to be the reliable evidence I need?
Is that why they were scared and lied?
If so, then it is time for a search.
Can you put out the plates?
- I am so hungry.
- Thanks!
Now's my chance!
What are you doing?
I am cleaning the floors.
- Did you get the forks?
- Can you help me here, too?
Okay.
Found it.
It is true.
This really is the truth.
I got it unexpectedly!
Isabella's second weakness!
So how should I go about this?
If I show this note and appeal to Grandma,
I wonder if I can oust Isabella and obtain the Mom's position?
Then I can ship out the brats unconditionally, too.
But how... how does Ray know about this?
Even Isabella should not know about this in the first place.
It is from the headquarters.
You should open it.
It is unfortunate, but that is how it is.
Goodbye.
